content.gatha1: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
content.gatha2: Patvā bodhiṃ visuddhaṃ sakalaguṇadadaṃ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
content.gathalast: Katvā dukkhassa antaṃ katasubhajanataṃ dukkhato mocayittha.
content.gatha2: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṃ uvimhaṃ suvipulamamalaṃ bodhisambhārabhūtaṃ,
content.gathalast: Hetuṃ hetvānurūpaṃ sugatagataphalaṃ bhāsato me suṇātha.
